sentences.en: Countermand that order with the agency, Pitcher , and don't bring any more of'em in here.
sentences.cn: 皮彻, 通知事务所,取消要人申请,叫他们别再送人过来.

sentences.en: EXMP : The general countermand the orders issued in his absence.
sentences.cn: 将军撤销了他不在时所发布的命令.

sentences.en: I can't countermand an order Winger's given.
sentences.cn: 我无法撤销温格下达的命令。

sentences.en: I have now to countermand that order, in consequence of the receipting of the letter this morning.
sentences.cn: 由于今日上午才收到来函,现在只好取消那份订单.

sentences.en: Please countermand our order for same.
The countermand of a cheque only takes effect after the expiration oflimit of time for presentment.
sentences.cn: 撤销支票付款的委托,仅于提示期限满后行之,始为有效.

words.tran_cn: 取消，撤消；下反对命令召回

trans.tran_cn: 取消, 撤消, 下反对命令召回
trans.tran_en: If you countermand an order, you cancel it, usually by giving a different order
